heading: Bastion of Faith Dungeon Guide
content: Bastion of Faith is a straight-forward single level dungeon that is solid for farming due to high EXP monster types and nothing particularly dangerous. It is currently a possible . Mera and her Sentinels are easy-to-defeat meat piñata bosses. This dungeon unlocks the , an essential aspect for a While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
